resources.string: When user has successfully signed in, this will be served as the main music player screen. The library used for checking the authentication for sign-in can be an external library like :Foursquare Android O:Auth

Here, the corresponding activity will be shown-up which will have the functionality to show the requested Playlist/Song. Also, here the user can still see the "Now Playing" option so that she can play/pause the song as per her mood. And, if she wants to go back to the previous menu, she can simply press the "Go Back Button", which will take her to the "corresponding" menu(Here, the main music player menu).

Here, we\'ll provide a way for applications to pass a newly created or downloaded media file to the media scanner service. The media scanner service will read metadata from the file and add the file to the media content provider. And for that the class that we\'ll use will be:
there will be a proper activity to handle the registration process

We can use an external library like, Foursquare Android O:Auth(Link to: https://github.com/foursquare/foursquare-android-oauth ), to authenticate if the user is granted permission to see the actual app content and use our music player.
